    • getFormat

      QuestionFormat getFormat()
      Gets the question's display format in a safe way. Result guaranteed to be non-null and to be compatible (via typekey categories) with the QuestionType.

    • getQuestionChoicesAsList

      List getQuestionChoicesAsList()
      Returns the list of database question choice entities for question choice questions

    • getOrderedSubQuestions

      SubQuestion[] getOrderedSubQuestions()
      Overridden by subclass with covariant return type.
      Returns:
      The subquestions for this question ordered by priority, text, and public id.

      Returns:
      properly indented question text
